Welcome Bot (TIRA - TIMSCDR Intelligent Robot Assistant) is an interactive information assistant designed to provide real-time details about the institute's courses, departments, events, and achievements. The robot uses AI with voice-based interaction to answer questions related to TIMSCDR and assist students and visitors efficiently. TIRA was developed by Coding Club 2025 at Thakur Institute of Management Studies, Career Development & Research (TIMSCDR) for the Master of Computer Applications (
TIMSCDR) for the Master of Computer Applications (MCA) department in 2025.
